main.name: Deyanira Villamar Davila Orihuela
main.description: SCRUM MASTER, QA AND SOFTWARE DEVELOPER ENGINEER
main.bio: Over 10 years of experience including Software development and software testing. Graduated as a computer system engineer. I really enjoy analyzing and propose solutions to IT problems. I have experience leading QA and Development teams.

education.description: High School and Technical Programming Career

work.title: Sr Consultant
work.description: Scrum master over 4 years for QA and Development teams. Software development using Java and C#. HP ALM administrator and created plugins using OTA and REST API. Manual and test automation scripts development. Experience in developing test plans and data requirements for different industry sectors such as Automotive, health and mobile.

work.title: PM
work.description: I was in charge of one development team, helped with testing activities, I was the first point of contact to gather requirements, helped to create processes for the company related to Scrum mindset and helped reviewing interviews for new talent for the company.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Developer of the ERP system that the enterprise created for government purposes below PSP framework. Strong skills using database procedures, triggers and functions manipulations.

work.title: Jr Software Developer
work.description: Developer for the SCADA application made to interact with steel software. Planned, documented and developed small applications.

work.title: Jr Software Developer / Intern
work.description: Developer below CMMI framework. Planned, developed and documented functionalities for SIG system.
